content:
# The Stone Furnace has produced a total of 3 Iron Plates, but I still need one more to reach the required 4 Iron Plates for crafting the Electronic Circuits. There are still 8 Iron Ore left in the furnace.

# To continue, I will insert 2 more coal into the furnace to ensure it has enough fuel to smelt the remaining Iron Ore.

insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=2)  # Insert 2 coal into the Stone Furnace to fuel it

# Now, I will wait for the smelting process to complete for the remaining Iron Ore until I have enough Iron Plates.
for _ in range(20):  # Wait for a maximum of 10 seconds (checking every 0.5 seconds)
    sleep(0.5)  # Wait for the smelting process
    furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(furnace)
    if furnace_inventory.get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0) >= 4:  # Check if at least 4 Iron Plates have been produced
        break

# Check the status of the furnace and overall inventory after waiting again
print(f"Final furnace inventory: {inspect_inventory(furnace)}")  # Check furnace output
print(f"Final inventory after iron smelting: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check overall inventory after smelting
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check entities on the map again
